import { Axios } from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../styles/HomePage.css"; function Detail() { const [stocks,setStocks]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ Axios.get('http://localhost:5000/read').then((response)=>{ setStocks(response.data) }) }) return (
{stocks.map((stock)=>{ return(
Company Name {} Market Cap $1985Cr Current Price $118Cr Stock P/E $1985Cr Dividend Yield 0.26% ROCE 33% ROE 38% Reserves 767 Debt 1234Cr
) })}
); } export default Detail;
